0.content: Huh..? Where am I? Aren't I supposed to start in the safehouse basement?

1.content: Yeah... the developers haven't made that area yet. You're starting here, #3.

3.content: I believe you should start looking around. You're at a campsite, from what I can tell.

4.content: Maybe up the stairs the devs put a friendly person who can tell you about your surroundings.

5.content: Cool! I'll move there with WASD on the keyboard or analogue ? ? ? ? on the game controller... do I really have to give the tutorial dialogue?

7.content: Ugh... when I meet this person, I can press E on the keyboard or Button 1 on the game controller to interact with them.
